recommendations: Kripal Singh “Rohit is a good thinking leader and a quick learner. He was always focused on delivery not just for the short term but also the long term. He not just met his plans but always exceeded them. While working with me Rohit demonstrated a strong processes and systems approach to deliverables and was always data-driven. Rohit is a good talent spotter and an even greater team builder. He was a great asset to my team. He always came to as a people person.”

Venkata Narayana Panchikarla, PMP, CSM “Rohit has been working in my project and he is well known for his work ethic, positive attitude and a very good team player. Rohit is well respected throughout the project for being the "go-to" person for the Business requirements and has been considered an expert in his field with his in depth knowledge, experience and business acumen. He is also a quick learner and changed the project dynamics within very few days of his involvement in our Conduent project and he has bridged very well the earlier known gaps. Happy to have him in any project and you will see the changes in a positive way.. Thanks so much, Rohit!”
